Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Lawndale/26th
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via 31st, Central Park, Douglas and Homan: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via 31st, Central Park, Douglas and Homan: due to, street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Armitage
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Armitage due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Armitage due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
